Refinements.Name: Fire!
Descriptions: The equipper gains 1 Charge stack every 3s, stacking up to 6 times. When launching an <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color>, consumes all Charge stacks and each stack consumed increases the skill's Daze inflicted by <color=#2BAD00>4%</color>.

The equipper gains 1 Charge stack every 3s, stacking up to 6 times. When launching an <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color>, consumes all Charge stacks and each stack consumed increases the skill's Daze inflicted by <color=#2BAD00>4.6%</color>.
